minions.name: Titania
minions.description: Return an opponent's minion to its owner's hand, OR play an extra minion

minions.name: Glymmer
minions.description: Talent: Until the start of your next turn, either another minion has -4 power (minimum power 0), OR this minion has +1 power

minions.name: Puck
minions.description: Play an extra action OR draw a card

minions.name: Tinx
minions.description: You may transfer an action played on another minion to this one

actions.name: Daisy Chain
actions.description: Play on a minion. Ongoing: If you control this minion it has +2 power, otherwise it has -2 power

actions.name: Leaf Armor
actions.description: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion has +1 power. Talent: Transfer this action to another minion

actions.name: Enchantment
actions.description: Play on a base and choose one: Ongoing: All minions here have +1 power. OR Ongoing: All minions here have -1 power

actions.name: Fairy Ballet
actions.description: Draw two cards, OR draw a card and play an extra action

actions.name: Ladybug
actions.description: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion cannot be destroyed. Talent: Transfer this action to another minion

actions.name: Magic Acorns
actions.description: Each other player discards a card at random, OR you draw a card and play an extra action

actions.name: Magic Wand
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: Other players cannot play actions on this base or on minions here

actions.name: Playful Tricks
actions.description: Destroy up to 2 actions played on minions and/or bases
